attributes.action: Protect our Youth: Educate Schools on Knife Crime
attributes.additional_details:
Knife crime is an up and coming issue that needs to be prevented. Educating students about the dangers and consequences can help prevent them from partaking in such activities.

Knife crime can increase fear and anxiety within communities. Education can help dispel myths, provide accurate information and bring awareness of support services to anyone that may need it.
attributes.background: Increase educational funding on teaching students about knife crime and the risks and implications of carrying a knife/weapon.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652406
